item.title: By: Chai
item.dc:creator: Chai
item.description: When we played Asheron's Call, there were quite a few real-life couples who were together before the game. A few more couples were made because of the game. In our guild in World of Warcraft, we have quite a few real life husband-wife teams (I'm one of the wives) and a couple family groups (father-son, two brothers, two cousins). It's always interesting to see the real-life relationships.
item.content:encoded: When we played Asheron’s Call, there were quite a few real-life couples who were together before the game. A few more couples were made because of the game. In our guild in World of Warcraft, we have quite a few real life husband-wife teams (I’m one of the wives) and a couple family groups (father-son, two brothers, two cousins). It’s always interesting to see the real-life relationships.
